  1. Unnamed Package
Contents
  1. Description
  2. Classes and Interfaces

Unnamed Package

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Accounts
    Accounts manages user data management, including the creation, modification, and deletion of stored users.
    Authentication
    Authentication handles all security related functionality, including password hashing and user verification.
    Budget
    The Budget class represents a user's financial data for a single calendar year.
    CrossFieldValidator
    Higher-level rules that depend on multiple fields.
    CSVHandler
    The CSVHandler class provides the methods to perform the low-level file I/O operations on the given CSV files, converting between CSV format and Transaction objects.
    DataReader
    DataReader class for the Prediction Team Module Reads, validates, calculates income and expenses, compares calculations, and summarizes report.
    DataTypeValidator
    Low-level, field-centric checks (emptiness, numeric, ranges, dates).
    DeficitSolver
    DeficitSolver class for the Prediction Team module.
    ErrorHandler
    ErrorHandler manages all error handling and recovery operations for the application.
    MainMenu
    This class allows the user to navigate to all of the different "pages" of the program.
    ModuleHub
    ModuleHub is the traffic controller: it routes requests to the proper team module.
    ReportAnalyzer
    Analyzer provides analytical computations over already-aggregated report data, such as identifying top categories and computing trends.
    ReportFormatter
    Formatter produces user-friendly string representations of report data, including currency values and text-based tables for console or log output.
    ReportManager
    Manages loading data and orchestrating the generation and presentation of report artifacts Responsibilities include: Loading income/expense data for a given year Producing monthly, category, and yearly summaries Computing overall balance figures Exporting summaries to CSV and displaying reports on screen
    ReportManager.YearlySummary
    Immutable value object representing yearly totals.
    ScenarioSimulator
    ScenarioSimulator class for the Prediction Team module.
    Storage
    Storage handles the saving, loading, and retrieving of stored user data between sessions of use.
    StorageManager
    The StorageManager Class handles reading and writing user budget information to and from saved files.
    SurplusOptimizer
    SurplusOptimizer class for the Prediction Team module.
    Transaction
    The Transaction class represents a single Transaction entry.
    UIUtilities
    UIUtilities provides utility methods for user interface operations.
    ValidationEngine
    Coordinates top-level validations and result aggregation.
    ValidationModule
    Validation module (the outer class) for PFM.
    ValidationResult
    Stores and manages the results of validation results.
